title: I3S Point Cloud layer: stats
description: Contains statistics about each attribute. Statistics are useful to estimate attribute distribution and range.

min.description: Minimum attribute value for the entire layer.

max.description: Maximum attribute value for the entire layer.

sum.description: Sum of the attribute values over the entire layer.

avg.description: Representing average or mean value. For example, sum/count.

labels.description: The statistics document may contain labeling information for the attribute values.
